## Pool.get() method

Obtains a pool-object from pool. If no free DbClients available a new one will be created. If connectionLimit is reached - will wait for a free pool-object.

UNSAFE! Better use exec(callback)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get(): Promise<T> | T;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;T&gt; \| T
